thread.title: Patricia and Anthony Kelliher
thread.title_full: Energia reviewed by Patricia and Anthony Kelliher

author: Patricia and Anthony Kelliher
title: Patricia and Anthony Kelliher
text:
energia and the people working for them are wonderful. its so easy to get information and really good explanations from them. Connor Fitzgerald was the person who introduced us to energia.
Connor fitzgerald just loves his job, he spoke so highly about energia and what advantage it would be to join energia and to tell you the truth we haven't looked back since.
